quotation.lengthUnitDescInitial: Please enter the dimensions in inches.
quotation.lengthUnitDesc: To convert centimeters to inches, multiply the given centimeter value by 0.393701. For example, to convert 10 centimeters to inches, multiply 10 centimeters by 0.393701 to get the inches value. (i.e.,) 10 x 0.393701 = 3.93701 inches.
quotation.weightUnitDescInitial: Please enter the weight in kilograms.
quotation.weightUnitDesc: To convert lbs to kg, multiply the given lbs value by 0.45359237 kg. For example, to convert 5 lbs to kilogram, multiply the given 5 lbs by 0.45359237 kg. Therefore, 5 lbs is approximately equal to 2.26796185 kg.

validation.piecesValidation: The Number of Pieces field is required

listDocument.document1: Letter of formal claim to the Airline with discrimination of the Claimed Value in USD and the way in which it is settled, detailing, if possible, the relationship of weight and commercial value of the cargo being claimed
listDocument.document3: Certificate of final disposition of the merchandise that is the object of the claim, that is, if it was destroyed (Deed of destruction), sold at a lower value (Copy of said invoices), or repaired (copy of the service invoice repair)

policies.message: By clicking on the accept button, I declare that I am of legal age and I authorize the registration and sending of my personal information to Tampa Cargo SA so that, as Responsible for the information, it can manage claims, complaints, recommendations and / or requests, as well as, I can treat my personal data in accordance with the other purposes established and applicable in the Privacy Policy, available at www.avianca.com. We inform you that you can exercise your rights as the owner of personal information by email habeasdata@avianca.com
